I hope there will be a sequel because I hate this ending. I feel sorry for poor Takahashi... even if he seems to be loved at the end, I want a sequel where he can find the girl and maybe make a happy ending.... This is the first hentai "rape" where I feel uncomfortable even a day or two after reading ^^'. Usually we only followed the part of the girl, or the rapist. But not from a third person who discovers his actions from a distance and who in addition takes pleasure in seeing him while he has feelings?  I find it very hard to forget xD 
Maybe the first hentai, with a "good" scenario? xD
Well, in any case, I want a suite with a happy ending so that I can sleep soundly... Even if seeing the works of the artist, it would surprise me enormously xD

@Kamui67 and you "realized" that following what logic? Your imagination isn't a "realisation". This kind of fantasy argumentation is sad. A story being written from any ones perspective doesn't force the reader to side with any side. That is just very obviously incorrect. People like all sorts of characters that aren't the main character or directly opposing the main character. guess people can't like grithith because berserks story follows guts .What a small brain train of thought.

People who like ntr dont care as much about the story as you fag. Get over it. Also the guy wasn't even her boyfriend or anything. So your POV dumb bs doesn't make any sense. 

@typical Japanese MainCharacter. No, there aren't laws because it is fiction, likewise non porn fiction stories dont follow physics laws among others for example.

They're just blurting out their own names like nothing. Of course, it's fiction, but damn, plenty of other similar type hentai where they at least use vague nick names, here? it seems that everyone knows everything, the fact that a cram school teacher is preying on its students and even the detail of drunk-raping with applied violence when she attempts to run away. What sort of place is that, there are no police looking into that, no one snitching or no one cares in the world of japahentai, the mc could've ended it by providing names and the video (why are they still calling it "tapes"? tapes haven't been a thing since at least blu-rays, guess it's a misstranslation), but then by that type the girl could've denied and claim that she's fine with it making him look like a dickhead, still, aren't there laws against that shit?
